mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attr (regDate, updateDate, `relTypeCode`, `relId`, `typeCode`, `type2Code`, `value`, expireDate) VALUES (NOW(), NOW(), #{relTypeCode}, #{relId}, #{typeCode}, #{type2Code}, #{value}, #{expireDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE updateDate = NOW() , `value` = #{value}, expireDate = #{expireDate}
